name: Nippon Papu
description:
Nippon Papu is Shoot 'em up  game play with 1024x768 resolution so game displays and plays correctly.

Controls awsd or arrow keys movement you can move diagonally also.

space shoot, alt+f4 exit game

Created by Papu Games

Programming and gameplay- Jesse Lintilä

Animations, character design and art- Hanna Kenakkala & Ville Lähetkangas

Music JDB Artist
